name: v0.3.1
body: New release for DOI.

name: v0.3.0
body:
- Add a few new wrappers to lumpy, the latest and recommended is smoove
- Add CRAM support
- Many improvements to the extraction of paired-end and split-read alignments from source BAM
- Fix SV evidence display with the -e option

name: v0.2.13
body: Small update to the VCF header output to include the BD info field.

name: v0.2.12
body:
In general, this version should be more robust to BAMs with funny CIGAR strings and lumpyexpress also be more robust.

Here is a summary of the changes since 0.2.11.
- Enable BAM streaming to bamfilterrg for samtools (chapmanb)
- Fix for streaming to pysam in bamfilterrg (chapmanb)
- fix mem leaks
- add cnvnator to bedpe
- fix issue with zero len read
- use gawk instead of awk, since some versions of awk do not support i=1;i<=k;++i style for loops
- many fixes to lsort and lmerge
- Add translocations to BEDPE
- get rid of -M in lumpyexpress

name: v0.2.11
body: Fix test cases.

name: v0.2.10
body: Fixed test data

name: v0.2.9
body:
- Add the ability to handle multiple read groups within a single BAM
- Fix an issue with the right-hand PDF when using the "-P" option
- Remove a check that ignored split reads flagged as paired

name: v0.2.8
body: Added a check to make sure the CIGAR string has at least 1 M.

name: v0.2.7
body: Remove a debug statement.

name: v0.2.6
body: Documentation updates and a split-read interchromosomal bug fix.

name: v0.2.4
body: Got rid of a perl  dependency by adding a python version of pairend-distro.

name: v0.2.4
body: Moved to MIT license.

name: v0.2.3
body: Fixed a helper script.

name: v0.2.2.3
body: Improved the fix for trailing zeros in the histo file.

name: v0.2.2.2
body: Fix 0-base calls.

name: v0.2.2.1
body:
Do not produce histos that have trailing zeros.
Robust to histo with trailing zeros.
Give error and continue on funny looking SR alignments.

name: v0.2.1
body: Fixed an issue with the MAX and 95% CI locations.

name: v0.2.1
body: Update README and helper scripts for new output.

name: v0.2.0
body:
Change the trimming strategy from summation-based to product-based.

Fixed BEDPE breakpoint probability issue.

Fixed left-side breakpoint interval size issue.
Removed GSL
